div.div:
POST /upload/image
Content-Type: multipart/formdata
HTTPS protocol
Content-Encoding: gzip
or
Content-type: application/json
HTTPS protocol
Content-Encoding: gzip
Content is base64 encoded

div.h1: Multiple Copies of POST for redundancy
1.There is a proxy before these servers so if a node dies the requests can be re-routed to other read replicas
2. In cassandra kind of work flow, there is a leader node for 1 hash and then there are follower nodes for a specific hash.
3. If leader died the next follower can take the ownership

switch.text: Multiple Copies of POST for redundancy...
